about: Hey! I’m Manu — a Computer Science grad from BUAP with a passion for web dev and AI. I’ve got some certifications in AI, like the IBM AI Engineer and Google’s Data Analytics. I love tech and art

modals.title: Taskdash
modals.info: Web app where users can create and take up tasks.

modals.title: Plank
modals.info: Web app designed to support exam preparation through two study modes: 'Flashcard' and 'Exam'

modals.title: ASCII ART
modals.info: Convert a video or image into ascii art
